{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Has author |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=Specifies the author of a particular wiki section or a wiki article in general (i.e. content). |long description= }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[Has type::Type:Page| ]] [[Has domain and range::; Category:Person| ]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Knows |Has author=WikiSysop |Has default form=Form:Person |rationale=Describes the knows relation between two persons. |long description= Connects two persons to each other via the "Knows" relation. This property belongs to the [[:Category:Symmetrical properties|symmmetric properties]], which means the following: If a person A knows a person B, then also B knows A. This type of inferencing is only possible with a connected triple store (including a reasoner). }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} [[Has type::Type:Page| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Person; Category:Person| ]]
[[Category:Symmetrical properties]]

{{Property |PAGENAME=Property:Homepage |Has author=WikiSysop |rationale=Attribute for providing an URL to the homepage of entity (e.g. a person, project or organization). |long description= }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True }} [[Has domain and range::Category:Person| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Organization| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Event| ]] [[Has domain and range::Category:Project| ]] [[Has type::Type:URL| ]]

{{Category |PAGENAME=Form:Add and edit Form |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |Has default form=Form:Add and edit Template |rationale=This category is used to allow easy bookkeeping of templates. |long description= You should always assign your templates to this category. Doing so, you can use a special form for your templates allowing you to provide all necessary metadata and tags for your wiki community to understand the templates. |Example_article=Form:Add and edit Template }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |Example_article=Form:Add and edit Template }} [[Category:Wiki part]]

|<noinclude> {{documentation}} <!-- Add cats and interwikis to the /doc subpage, not here! --> helper template for pipe symbol, which can e.g. not be used directly in template parameter calls. </noinclude>

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Header for wiki parts |Has author=Daniel |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to display a nice header for all wiki parts, i.e. forms, templates etc |long description= |parameters=
{{Header for wiki parts
|Category=Form
|Icon=Image:Cog-green.png
|Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}}
|Thumbnail image={{{Form thumbnail|}}}
|Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}}
|author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||[[has author::{{{Has author|}}}]]}}
|Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||[[part of::{{{part of|}}}]]}}
|Example article={{#ifeq:{{{Example article|}}}|||[[Example article::{{{Example article|}}}]]}}
|Has special namespace={{#ifeq:{{{Has special namespace|}}}|||[[Has special namespace::{{{Has special namespace|}}}]]}}
}}
|hints for templates and forms=The following values for category are allowed: Form, Template |Calls template=Template:Tablelongrow, Template:Tablerow, }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} {{#switch: {{{Category}}} |Template=

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Property |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=Displays a property and some essential metadata. |long description= }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} __NOTOC__ {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Property |Icon=Image:smw_plus_property_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} }} {{{long description|}}} === Default form === New pages (i.e. "redlinks") which are related via this property shall use the form: *{{#ifeq:{{{Has default form|}}}||''not specified''|[[Has default form::{{{Has default form|}}}]]}} [[Page has default form::Form:Add and edit Property| ]] [[Category:Property]]

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Tablelongrow |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This is a helper template to display a table row spanning 2 columns. |parameters=
{{Tablelongrow
|Align=center|left|right
|Color=white|..
|Font size=100%
|Value=text to display
}}
}} | colspan="2" style="text-align: {{{Align|center}}}; background: {{{Color|white}}}"|
{{{Value}}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Tablerow |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This is helper template to display a table row containing two columns. |parameters=
{{Tablerow
|Label=name of the label
|Value=text right to the label
}}
}} {{!}}style="vertical-align: top;" {{!}}{{{Label}}} {{!}} {{{Value|undefined}}}

|title=
|retrieved=
|publisher=
}}

{{Template |PAGENAME=Template:Category |Has author=User:WikiSysop |part of=SMWplus Basic Ontology Section |rationale=This template is used to display a category. |long description= You should use this template to provide your wiki-community with a proper documentation of the categories used in the wiki. |Calls template=Template:Header for wiki parts }} {{Copyright of article |own work=True |copyright holder=Ontoprise GmbH |year=2009 }} __NOTOC__ {{Header for wiki parts |Category=Category |Icon=Image:Smw_plus_category_icon_100x100.gif |Pagetitle={{PAGENAME}} |Short description={{#ifeq:{{{rationale|}}}|||[[rationale::{{{rationale|}}}]]}} |author={{#ifeq:{{{Has author|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{Has author|}}}|,|x|[[has author::x]]|,}}}} |Wiki section={{#ifeq:{{{part of|}}}|||{{#arraymap:{{{part of|}}}|,|x|[[part of::x]]|,}}}} }} {{{long description|}}} === Default form === This category is populated by the form: {{#ifeq:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|Category:Category|*{{#ifeq:{{{Has default form|}}}||''not specified''|[[Page has default form::{{{Has default form|}}}]]}}|*{{#ifeq:{{{Has default form|}}}||''not specified''|[[Has default form::{{{Has default form|}}}]]}} }}[[Page has default form::Form:Add and edit Category| ]] === Defined in templates === This category is used for category annotations in the templates: {{#ifeq:{{#ask:[[Category:Template]][[Defines category::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]|default=}}||* none ''(you can create a new template using this category by clicking here: [{{SERVER}}{{SCRIPTPATH}}/index.php/Special:CreateTemplate?category={{urlencode:{{PAGENAME}}}} create template])''|
    {{#ask:[[Category:Template]][[Defines category::{{FULLPAGENAME}}]]|format=template|template=Show defining template|link=none}}
}} {{#ifeq:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|Category:Category|[[Category:Wiki part| ]]|}}[[Is category::true| ]]
